title: The Real Biden Bill: At Least $4.6 Trillion
sub_head: Program by program, here’s how Democrats disguise the real cost of their entitlement blowout.
body:
The Congressional Budget Office on Thursday released its “official” cost estimates for the House tax and entitlement bill, but don’t believe it. The CBO gnomes aren’t lying. They’re obliged to score the bill under the rules set by Congress. And Democrats have rigged the budget rules with multiple tricks that disguise the real cost by trillions of dollars.
Democrats phase out the biggest programs in the bill while paying for them with 10 years of tax increases. They phase-in other programs and off-load costs to the states. The Penn Wharton Budget Model estimates the House bill would cost nearly $4.6 trillion over 10 years if temporary provisions are made permanent, as most will be.
